name: Another day Reaping away
description:
As death, reaping souls is your job. Use your health bar to cut through a constantly increasing number of enemies, and get paid along the way!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD to Move.

Use Left Click to Attack (3 Hit Combo).

Use SPACE to Dodge (with invincibility).

Use Right Click for a weak Boomerang.

Press E once you have a 20 or more combo to Heal. 

Press R to skip the tutorial, and to restart when dead. (It auto restarts if you wait)

TIPS:

Your scythes range is longer the lower heath you are at, so don't panic, and use the range to your advantage.

You heal based on your combo amount, so if you aren't about to die, hold onto your combo to stay at low heath longer.

You gain combo based on the damage you deal, so try and land your powerful 3rd strike on as many enemies as possible! You can dash (space) mid-strike to connect with even more enemies, or the same enemy twice.

The Ogres have a very long range, so it is best to take them out as soon as you see them, timing your dash's invincibility to go over their shockwave.

Click off of the screen to pause.

My Gold Highscore:

48.2k gold

Max Combo (in a different run):

331

Programmed by me in 3 days, sprites by my brother.

Bug fix 1: Get webgl version working properly.

Bug fix 2: After surviving for very long, it used to only spawn skeletons

The 1.0 version was created after these two bug fixes, but I have added more juice and fixes from comments since. The most up-to-date one is playable in the browser!

Thanks for all the great feedback!
